feats.name: Harrower Dedication
feats.description: You've dedicated yourself to the art of harrowing, a traditional Varisian fortune-telling practice using a deck of cards known as a Harrow deck. You can draw upon the power of the harrow to create supernatural effects based on the cards you draw.

feats.name: Otherworldly Magic
feats.description: Your elven blood runs strong enough to grant you magical abilities. Choose one cantrip from the arcane spell list. You can cast this spell as an arcane innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

feats.name: Alchemical Crafting
feats.description: You can use the Craft activity to create alchemical items. When you select this feat, you immediately add the formulas for four common 1st-level alchemical items to your formula book.

feats.name: Hobnobber
feats.description: You are skilled at learning information through conversation. The Gather Information exploration activity takes you half as long as normal (typically 1 hour instead of 2).

feats.name: Reach Spell
feats.description: You can extend the range of your spells. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that has a range, increase that spell's range by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, you extend its range to 30 feet.

feats.name: Tell Fortune
feats.description: Whether through harrow cards, palm-reading, star-reading or some other method of divining the future, you are able to predict the futures of other people surprisingly well. You can spend 1 hour telling someone else's fortune. Attempt a Fortune-Telling Lore check against a hard DC of a target creature’s level, producing the effects of augury on a success with regards to the creature’s future. Regardless of the result, the creature is then immune to your Tell Fortune for 1 week.

inventory.name: Spellbook
inventory.description: Contains various notes and arcane theories

inventory.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
inventory.description: 3 charges per day, casts magic missiles at 1st level

inventory.name: Adventurer's Pack
inventory.description: Includes backpack, bedroll, 10 pieces of chalk, flint and steel, 50 feet of rope, 2 weeks' rations, soap, 5 torches, and a waterskin

notes.title: Imperial Lineage Research
notes.content: Visited the Grand Library of Taldor to research more about my imperial bloodline. The librarian mentioned a collection of ancient texts detailing the rise and fall of the first Taldan emperors. Need to gain higher access privileges to view these restricted archives.

notes.title: Arcane Breakthrough
notes.content: While practicing the manipulation of fire magic, I discovered a technique to make the flames burn with a distinctive blue-white color. The heat seems more intense, but the effect requires precise control of my innate energies. Must experiment further to refine this.

spells.name: Light
spells.targets: 1 object of 1 Bulk or less, either unattended or possessed by you or a willing ally
spells.duration: Until the next time you make your daily preparations
spells.description: The object glows with bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

spells.name: Electric Arc
spells.description: An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. You deal 1d4+4 electricity damage to the target creatures. The targets must attempt a basic Reflex save. The electricity damage increases to 2d4+4 at 3rd level, 3d4+4 at 5th level, 4d4+4 at 7th level, and so on.

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.description: You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.description: The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose any one of four options: cook, lift, clean, or color.

spells.name: Mage Hand
spells.targets: 1 unattended object of 1 Bulk or less
spells.description: You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly. You can move the object 20 feet each time you Sustain the Spell. The hand can't move an object more than 20 feet above the ground unless the object started more than 20 feet above the ground.

spells.name: Ray of Frost
spells.description: You fire a ray of frost. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the target's AC. On a hit, you deal 1d4+4 cold damage plus 1d4 persistent cold damage. On a critical hit, double the initial damage, but not the persistent damage.

spells.name: Telekinetic Projectile
spells.description: You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target's AC. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage—as appropriate for the object you hurled—equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.duration: Until the next time you make your daily preparations
spells.description: You ward yourself with magical energy. You gain a +1 item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. While wearing mage armor, you use your unarmored proficiency to calculate your AC.

heightened.4th: You gain a +2 item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5.
heightened.6th: You gain a +2 item bonus to AC, a maximum Dexterity modifier of +6, and a +1 item bonus to saving throws.
heightened.8th: You gain a +3 item bonus to AC, a maximum Dexterity modifier of +6, and a +1 item bonus to saving throws.

spells.name: Command
spells.description: You shout a command that's hard to ignore. You can command the target to approach you, run away, release what it's holding, fall prone, or stand in place. The creature must succeed at a Will save or follow your command on its next turn. Some commands might require the target to Seek to approach you.

heightened.3rd: You can target up to 2 creatures.
heightened.5th: You can target up to 6 creatures.
heightened.7th: You can target up to 12 creatures.
heightened.9th: You can target up to 24 creatures.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: You send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, you can fire an additional missile at the same or a different target.

heightened.+2: You fire one additional missile with each action you spend.

spells.name: Shocking Grasp
spells.description: You shroud your hands in a crackling field of electricity. Make a melee spell attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 2d12 electricity damage. If the target is wearing metal armor or is made of metal, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll with shocking grasp, and the target also takes 1d4 persistent electricity damage on a hit.

heightened.+1: The damage increases by 1d12, and the persistent electricity damage increases by 1.

spells.name: Blazing Bolt
spells.description: You fire a bolt of roaring flame streaking through the air. Make a ranged spell attack against the AC of a target creature. On a success, you deal 5d6 fire damage. On a critical success, you deal double damage.

spells.name: Knock
spells.description: You knock on a locked door, window, gate, chest, or other object with a closure, and it opens. This spell works against most mundane locks but not ones of exceptional materials, such as adamantine locks or locks requiring unique keys. For complex locks, the GM might roll a secret check using your spell DC against the Thievery DC to pick the lock.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.targets: 1 spell effect or unattended magic item
spells.description: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you successfully counteract a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

bloodline.name: Imperial
bloodline.description: The blood of dragons or other powerful reptilian creatures runs through your veins. The inheritors of this bloodline are often ambitious and proud, with a tendency toward imperiousness and a sense of superiority.

focus_spells.name: Ancestral Memories
focus_spells.duration: Until the end of your next turn
focus_spells.description: You delve into the memories of your ancestors, seeking knowledge. You gain the trained proficiency rank in one skill of your choice. This effect lasts until the duration expires.

heightened.3rd: You can select two skills, and the proficiency rank you gain is expert instead of trained.
heightened.5th: You can select three skills, and the proficiency rank you gain is master instead of trained.
heightened.7th: You can select four skills, and the proficiency rank you gain is legendary instead of trained.

staff.name: Xanderghul's Flawless Hammer
staff.description: Runelord Xanderghul's ancient weapon of rule.

spells.name: Figment
spells.description: You create a visual illusion that distracts the target. This illusion appears as a vague shape just on the edge of the target's vision. The target must attempt a Will save.

spells.name: Infectious Enthusiasm
spells.description: You inspire your target with enthusiasm. The target gains a +1 status bonus to a skill of your choice and to Will saves to guard against mental effects.

spells.name: Illusory Object
spells.description: You create an illusory visual image of a stationary object. The entire image must fit within a 20-foot cube. The object appears to animate naturally, but it can't move outside of the cube.

spells.name: Fashionista
spells.description: You surround a creature in stylish illusory clothes that shimmer with light. The creature gains a +1 status bonus to checks to Make an Impression.

spells.name: Overselling Flourish
spells.description: You present an ordinary item as if it were valuable, or cause a willing merchant to perceive something you offer as being worth far more than it is.

spells.name: Illusory Creature
spells.description: You create an illusory image of a huge or smaller creature. It generates the appropriate sounds, smells, and feels believable to the touch. If you and the illusory creature are ever farther than 500 feet apart, the spell ends.

spells.name: Instant Parade
spells.description: You create a small but impressive parade, about 30 feet long and 10 feet wide, that marches and plays music as you direct. The parade consists of magical constructs that resemble humans with brightly colored costumes and festive instruments.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description: Three illusory duplicates of you swirl around your space, potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the images instead of you. These images move with you and disappear one at a time when a foe succeeds at attacking one of them.
